extendedInfo.description: Fastcase for Android is a free legal research application, putting the American law library in the palm of your hand. Fastcase contains cases and statutes from all 50 states and from the federal government. You can search by citation, keyword (in Boolean or natural language), or browse statute collections.FEATURES:- Free, searchable library of American cases and statutes- Keyword (Boolean), natural language, and citation search- Browse or search statutes- Most relevant results first- Customizable, sortable search results- Search results automatically display number of citing cases- Jump right to most relevant paragraph of any case or statute- Integrated research history- Save favorite documents for use later- Synchronize with Fastcase desktop applications using Mobile Sync- Updated dailyFastcaseâs mobile apps have won the prestigious American Association of Law Libraries New Product of the Year Award and were named the 2011 Legal Productivity App of the Year.Fastcase for Android also uses smart search technology from Fastcaseâs fully-featured Web-based legal research application, which allows you to sort the most relevant results to the top of the list, customize and re-sort search results, and integrate citation analysis tools right into the results list.This application is free, but youâll need to register an account so that you can save favorites and your own customized search history. There are tons of customizable features, so the more you use the Fastcase app, the better it fits you!Fastcaseâs desktop application (www.fastcase.com) is widely considered the smartest alternative for legal research â allowing visual mapping of search results, dual-column printing, and more complete citation analysis and sorting tools. Fastcase was founded in 1999 and has hundreds of thousands of subscribers from around the world.Fastcase for Android is the worldâs largest free mobile law library. Happy searching!

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I use it in Virginia where we can utilize the same login as for our free bar account. One can save any searches and then access them by logging into Fastcase via the free bar account to print the cases. When coupled with the also free Easy Virginia Legal Resources app, Virginia lawyers have most of what they need for quick access to legal and research resources for use by mobile devices.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Need to update the app.
reviews.comment: For changes in the law in 2013.  Otherwise this becomes a useless tool.
reviews.author: E. Jay Abt

reviews.title: Good App.
reviews.comment: I am still missing sharing options and would like to see an updade that will preserve document position and current search when u open another app for example note taking app. Otherwise awesome app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great start, room for improvement
reviews.comment: I\'m so glad Fastcase finally showed some love to us Android users. Too bad the app is basically a port of the iPhone app.  The real problem is that there is no landscape support. For a phone, that\342\200\231s not a big deal. But for a tablet, that\'s a huge pain. Please fix!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Finally!
reviews.comment: Jurisdiction selection could be more intuitive, but it may prove to be easier with more use. Overall interface is nice & I really like the in-app search feature.  Very excited to finally see this app! Note to VA attorneys, you CAN use the app, but you need to click \"mobile sync\" under options on the website first. Once synced you\'re golden!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Finally!!!
reviews.comment: I was intrigued to say the least about this applications ability to have access to so many databases and, as far as I can see, they are mostly to date. The settings are slightly cumbersome and the citations could be more concise to ensure validity but I\'m excited to find some kind of documentation on common laws and statutes for the common person.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bout time
reviews.comment: I\'ve been waiting for fastcase to release its android app. Its handy and quick. The browsing menus still need a little work, and the search method is on par with an intro app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t Print or save permanently
reviews.comment: There is no option to upload to Dropbox, share cases or print anything.  This is just search and look.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Greatly appreciate the integrity of this app
reviews.author: Tri Truong

reviews.title: Access for bar association members
reviews.comment: Can fastcase users who log in via their bar association websites use this app?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Above average
reviews.comment: Good app. Missing ability to browse U.S. Const.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Need ability to share or print
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Complete crap
reviews.comment: Been using WordPerfect since version 4.1. Lack of support and crap like this have destroyed Corel and what used to be the best word processing program. I\'m done with both.
reviews.author: J. Michael Goldberg

reviews.title: Dont waste my time
reviews.comment: Any app that has a sign in beginning w an initial register process where that registration form wont recognize ANY email I use (g, hot, y, yahoo, live, aol, rocket) gets the minimum for wasting my time I wish I could penalize the google app team and app maker for taking a terminally ill persons 45 min.
reviews.author: Kaare Beell

reviews.comment: I can\'t open the app. I tried installing many times. Does anyone have any ideas. I keep getting the screen cancel, or force close.
reviews.author: Jeffrey Allan Miller
